overview:
Eric Bernstein joins eFront from Sophis, where he spent four years as chief operating officer in the North America regions. Prior to joining Sophis, Eric spent six years at Linedata Services in various roles including senior vice president and head of sales in North America. Prior to Linedata Services he held positions at PaineWebber as head equity trader, and at Melvin Specialists as a market maker and equity trader. Eric brings a tremendous track record of solutions selling and marketing in the financial industry.

Eric Bernstein joined eFront in 2011 as COO, North America and is responsible for coordinating Sales and Professional Services in the US and Canada and developing eFrontâ€™s growing North American client base that includes private equity and real estate investors, fund managers and service providers.
